channel.title: esy Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest esy news and events.

item.title: New release - 0.6.0 ðŸŽ‰
item.description:
We went quite again for a while with the blog - between the last post, we released 0.5.* and now 0.6.0.

This time received contributions from 28 contributors! Thank you everyone! Let's take a quick look at what new in 0.6.0.

item.title: What's new in esy 0.4.x
item.description: This is the first public blog post on the esy dev blog. We've been writing lots and lots of code to make esy work well, and until now we haven't communicated much about esy.
